scripts.install:all: npm run install:services && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../team-service && npm install && cd ../event-service && npm install && cd ../evaluation-service && npm install && cd ../training-service && npm install && cd ../funding-service && npm install

scripts.build:services: cd services/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../user-service && npm run build && cd ../team-service && npm run build && cd ../event-service && npm run build && cd ../evaluation-service && npm run build && cd ../training-service && npm run build && cd ../funding-service && npm run build
